channel.title: Project-DS
channel.description:
[center]We are a free open server with no donations required to achieve maximum runescape benefits![/center]
[center][b]We are currently looking for staff members in game to help our players![/b][/center]
[center][b]How to play?[/b][/center] [center]I would highly recommend to download the client, it's only 500kb and saves hassle from popups at the webclient.
http://up.ht/149DM2H
Or player on our webclient http://irpanic.ulmb.com (ONLINE NOW!)
(The server is currently under development very sorry for the inconvenience, server will remain online while development takes place but please expect some regular updates to happen)
[center]- Vote store - Curse prayer - Players shop - All Tzhaar waves - Custom quest tab - Bank slots fixed - Money pouch - 317 Gameframe - Multiple custom item - Custom ranks + crowns - Clan chat + Lootshare - summoning - Perfect skillcape emotes - All 25 skill work - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills - Skillcape shop - Quest cape require all stats 99
Minigames - Pest control - Warriors guild - Barrows - Duel arena - Tzhaar cave
Bosses - Dagannoth kings - Tormented demons - King black dragon - Godwars - Corporal beast[/center]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2nlh7o6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/14ik7tl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/igenmh.jpg[/img]
Posting more pictures soon![/center]

item.title: Project-DS
item.dc:creator: @IRPanic IRPanic
item.description:
@IRPanic wrote:

[center]We are a free open server with no donations required to achieve maximum runescape benefits![/center]

[center]We are currently looking for staff members in game to help our players![/center]

[center]How to play?[/center]
[center]I would highly recommend to download the client, it’s only 500kb and saves hassle from popups at the webclient.

http://up.ht/149DM2H

Or player on our webclient http://irpanic.ulmb.com (ONLINE NOW!)

(The server is currently under development very sorry for the inconvenience, server will remain online while development takes place but please expect some regular updates to happen)
